alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 17 at 10:03PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
